SEARCH
Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.api.services.managers.arm.specialized

Class ARMSpecializedManager

java.lang.Object
fr.lirmm.chocominer.api.services.managers.AbstractSpecializedManager
fr.lirmm.chocominer.api.services.managers.arm.specialized.ARMSpecializedManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiningManagerInterface<AssociationRule>
@Service public class ARMSpecializedManager extends AbstractSpecializedManager implements MiningManagerInterface<AssociationRule>
Manages the instantiation of specialized association rule mining constraints based on their types. It allows for an easier correspondence between app solving strategies : (AbstractARMSolvingStrategy) and api constraints : APIConstraint. This class is a Spring Service

    • run

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Solutions<AssociationRule>> run(ConstraintsRequest constraintsRequest, String filePath) throws IOException, InstantiationException, UndefinedConstraintParameterException, InvocationTargetException, NotEnoughParametersException, IllegalAccessException
      Executes a mining process based on the types of mining, the given constraints and file path.
      Specified by:
      run in interface MiningManagerInterface<AssociationRule>
      Parameters:
      constraintsRequest - The request containing a list of constraints to be used for the mining process.
      filePath - The path to the file containing the transactions used in the mining process.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the solutions or outcomes of the mining process.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file or resource.
      InstantiationException - If an error occurs during instantiation of mining components.
      UndefinedConstraintParameterException - If a needed parameter for the instantiation of a concrete constraint is undefined or missing.
      InvocationTargetException - If an error occurs while invoking methods during mining.
      NotEnoughParametersException - If there are not enough arguments provided for the instantiation of a concrete constraint.
      IllegalAccessException - If an error occurs due to illegal access during mining.
